summary: Money20/20 is the place where money does business. With over 8,000+ people from 2,800+ companies, it's where the fintech power players unite.
title: Money20/20 to be held in Las Vegas October 23-26
content: Money20/20 is the place where money does business.
With over 8,000+ people from 2,800+ companies, it's where the fintech power players unite.

As a global stage where stories unfold and the future is shaped, Money20/20 is where payments, banking, fintech and the financial services community gather to create new and disruptive ways to move, manage, spend and borrow money.

The premier show for C-level executives, renowned speakers, innovators and disruptors from across the world, Money20/20 creates the right connections and the right discoveries to enable the industry to achieve new goals and grow.
As we prepare to deliver one of the industry’s most consequential show of the year, in Las Vegas, October 23-26, you’ll have the opportunity to take part in:
Collisions: This isn’t networking - this is your network.
Conversations: Harness the power of fintech’s biggest hive mind.
Serendipity: 4 days of right-place-right-time moments.
Magic: Fintech’s secret sauce for success.
Money20/20 USA is only weeks away. See the full agenda and keynote announcements and be sure to grab your pass today!
Money20/20 link: https://us.money2020.com/
Agenda link: https://us.money2020.com/content/agenda#/agenda
Keynotes link: https://us.money2020.com/speakers
Grab your pass today link: https://account-us.money2020.com/pass-picker#/
